vlive.korean: [개그 프로그램이 무슨 소용이야 나 꺽꺽 웃다가 코 먹어서 배도 안 고파...] [There's no need to turn on comedy. I laughed andsnorted so much I'm not even hungry...] View video V PICK! : [BTS] 공공칠빵 소시지빵은 가라 호석오빵의 시대가 왔노라니,,🍞 (HAPPY J-HOPE DAY+1!)
vlive.english: [There's no need to turn on comedy. I laughed andsnorted so much I'm not even hungry...]

vlive.korean: [학계의 정설 오빠 얼굴에 내 인생의 답이 있는데 공부가 무슨 소용이냐] 그냥... [Experts say your face provides all the answers] Just... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 하이퍼리얼리즘 극사실주의자 잇진선생님의 임.폴.턴.트 럽마이셀프썰💜 (JIN talking about self-praise story)
vlive.english: [Experts say your face provides all the answers] Just...

vlive.korean: 한국은 여름이 다 갔는데 이걸 사서 소용이 있을까요? [갑자기 굉장히 논리적..] Summer is all over in Korea. Will there be a need for this? 듣기 View video ITZY : [ITZY? ITZY!(있지?있지!)] EP38. 베트남에 있지!
vlive.english: Summer is all over in Korea. Will there be a need for this?

vlive.korean: [둡 얼굴이 예술아트인데 네일아트가 무슨 소용이냐며 지워달라했다네요] 방금? [Tofu's face is a piece of art so she doesn't need any nail art] Just? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [3년 전 오늘의 TWICE] 난 신들한테 매일 메일 써,, 이 쁘띠요정들에게 우주를 달라구,,💌(TWICE’s wordplay 3years ago)
vlive.english: [Tofu's face is a piece of art so she doesn't need any nail art] Just?

vlive.korean: 아무 소용 없다니까. It's all for nothing. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [루다] Welcome LUDA's Birthday Party🎉

examples.korean: What’s the good of earning all that money if you don’t have time to enjoy it? 발음듣기 즐길 시간이 없으면 그 돈을 다 벌어 봐야 무슨 소용이 있어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What’s the good of earning all that money if you don’t have time to enjoy it? 발음

examples.korean: Their efforts were unavailing. 발음듣기 그들의 노력은 소용이 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
His excuses cut no ice with me. 발음듣기 그의 변명은 나에겐 아무 소용이 없어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His excuses cut no ice with me. 발음

examples.korean: It’s not a bit of use complaining. 발음듣기 불평해 봐야 아무 소용이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s not a bit of use complaining. 발음

examples.korean: What’s all this crying in aid of? 발음듣기 이렇게 울어 봐야 무슨 소용이 있겠니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What’s all this crying in aid of? 발음
